system.requirements:
Tier 3; Perception 35, Dodge +10 or Parry +10
Aptitudes: Perception, Finesse
Veteran Talent Requirement Fulfilled
system.effect:
Veteran Talent Requirement: Character successfully Evades three consecutive attacks without being struck whilst on a mission.
When Character makes a successful Evasion Test against an attack, they impose -10 to Ballistic and Weapon Skill Attacks to hit them until the start of their next turn.
